testimonials.name: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.statment: Waydin is dedicated and very passionate about her work. Working together makes me motivated to go above and beyond to reach our goals and of course, having fun while doing so.

testimonials.name: Abdoel Samaai
testimonials.statment: WaydinJochem: Is a Man that faces challenges head on and is not afraid to speak and give his opinion.He doesn't rush into situations without thinking about every detail first. He is the type of person you can go to for help and he finds ways to do things differently.He has a great interlect which is one of his good qualities.He is a great person and one that people would be happy to work with.

testimonials.name: Zulaigah Benjamin
testimonials.statment: Working with Waydin is a pleasure.He is good at seeing the big picture in both the areas of database design and data definition. His ability to asses a situation from all angles and see the myriad of potential ramifications of a particular course of action was very helpful. And always lends a helping hand where needed

testimonials.name: Sidwell Batyi
testimonials.statment: Waydin is an energetic young lad, he is an extrovert that works great with teams because he adds his own energy to any situation which makes working with him a breeze

testimonials.name: Meezaan Davids
testimonials.statment: Waydin's eagerness to learn and willingness to ask questions have made him a valuable member of our team. He is new to coding but has been steadily improving his skills. His bright personality and positive attitude make working with him one on one a pleasure. Waydin's enthusiasm for learning and willingness to ask questions have been invaluable to our team. He is new to coding but has quickly become a valuable contributor to our projects. His bright personality and eagerness to learn make him a pleasure to work with. As Waydin's team leader, I have been impressed with his dedication to learning and his willingness to ask questions. He has a natural talent for coding and has been steadily improving his skills. His positive attitude and eagerness to learn make him a valuable asset to our team. needed
